releaseNotes:
* Breaking change: CopyTo and ToExpando are now in different namespaces.
      * Breaking change: ToExpando returns ExpandoObject type instead of dynamic.
      * Changed ToExpando params names.
      * Added support for TimeSpan to/from string and Guid to byte array (byte array to guid already supported).
      * ValueConverter is made public.
title: Sinbadsoft.Lib.Model
